org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper
Class DeserializationManager

java.lang.Object
  org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper.DeserializationManager

public class DeserializationManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class performs the RDF to bean conversion.

Michele Mostarda ( mostarda@fbk.eu )

Method Detail

getDeserializerFor

public CriteriaDeserializer getDeserializerFor(java.lang.Class clazz,
                                               java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations)
                                        throws DeserializationException
Returns the most appropriate Deserializer for the given class.

Parameters:
clazz - class to be deserialized.
annotations - annotations associated to the given clazz.
Returns:
the best deserializer chosen for the given class.
Throws:
DeserializationException

staticDeserialize

public <T> T staticDeserialize(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                               QueryEndpoint endpoint)
                    throws DeserializationException
Performs a static deserialization.

Parameters:
clazz - class of object to be deserialized.
endpoint - endpoint used to retrieve triples to be deserialized.
Returns:
an instance of class T representing the static deserialization of class T.
Throws:
DeserializationException

deserialize

public <T> java.util.Collection<T> deserialize(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                               QueryEndpoint endPoint)
                                    throws DeserializationException
Deserializes the given class returning a list of objects with type clazz for every instance detected in the RDF representation exposed with the query endPoint.

Parameters:
clazz - class to be deserialized.
endPoint - endpoint exposing the RDF data to be mapped to beans.
Returns:
list of deserialized beans.
Throws:
DeserializationException

addDeserializer

public boolean addDeserializer(CriteriaDeserializer deserializer)
Registers a deserializer within the manager.

Parameters:
deserializer - registers a deserializer to this manager.
Returns:
true if the deserializer is effectively added, false otherwise.

removeDeserializer

public boolean removeDeserializer(CriteriaDeserializer deserializer)
Deregisters a deserializer from the manager.

Parameters:
deserializer - deserializer to be deregistered.
Returns:
true if the deserializer is effectively removed, false otherwise.

deserialize

protected <T> T deserialize(DeserializationContext context,
                            java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                            java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations,
                            Identifier identifier,
                            QueryEndpoint endpoint)
                 throws DeserializationException
Performs a type deserialization.

Parameters:
context - context used for deserialization.
clazz - class to be deserialized.
annotations - annotations associated to clazz.
identifier - identifier associated to to clazz.
endpoint - endpoint exposing the RDF dataset mapped to clazz.
Returns:
the Java object representing the deserialization of clazz.
Throws:
DeserializationException
